name: TME 310A Physical Modeling
postCreateCommand: curl -Ls https://github.com/astral-sh/uv/releases/latest/download/uv-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz | tar xz -C /tmp && sudo cp /tmp/uv-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/uv /usr/local/bin/ && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/uv && if [ ! -d '.venv' ]; then uv venv --python 3.10; fi && source .venv/bin/activate && uv sync && if ! grep -q 'source /workspaces/TME_310_hwxx_template/.venv/bin/activate' ~/.bashrc; then echo 'source /workspaces/TME_310_hwxx_template/.venv/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc; fi
